briefs.headline: Arrival in Musanze & permit briefing
briefs.summary: Concierge confirms trackers, sunset briefing, and standby driver Aline with Land Cruiser.

segments.title: Check in at Sabyinyo Silverback Lodge
segments.instruction: Drop bags and meet concierge liaison Claudine in the lounge for welcome tea.

segments.title: Permit briefing
segments.instruction: Emmanuel will review gorilla permits and collect passports for overnight validation.

alerts.message: Avoid travel after 21:00. Driver will remain onsite for late arrivals.

group_savings.nudge_copy: Need RWF 1.3M to lock-in Virunga shuttles. Share group link tonight.
group_savings.next_step: Share WhatsApp reminder after permit briefing.

briefs.headline: Gorilla trek & Kigali transfer
briefs.summary: Early departure for Kinigi HQ, trek with Sabyinyo troop, lunch in Musanze then sunset transfer to Kigali.

segments.title: Meet driver in lodge lobby
segments.instruction: Carry passports, permits, and packed breakfast; concierge will stage rain ponchos by reception.

segments.title: Gorilla trek with Silverback family

segments.title: Transfer to Kigali Marriott
segments.instruction: Concierge pre-check-in complete; expect dusk arrival, hotel will hold dinner until 21:00.
